artist: Engraver: Pieter Schenk; Painter: After Sir Godfrey Kneller
description: full length portrait of The Duke of Glocester as a child seated in an interior;  white feather ornament on head; pointing with his right hand to a small white dog seated at his feet; velvet curtain behind
inscription:

title: Portrait of the Duke of Glocester
